price: ߤߊߟߌ߬ ߣߴߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߓߍ߯ ߕߎ߲߬ ߞߵߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߟߊߕߋߟߋ߲߫ ߕߊ߯ߛߌߟߊ߫ ߞߋߟߋ߲߫ ߞߊ߲߬ ߸ ߒ߬ ߕߘߍ߬ ߘߴߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߟߊߡߌ߲߬ ߖߌ߫ ߛߌߦߊߡߊ߲߫ ߠߊ߫
arabic: وَأَلَّوِ ٱسۡتَقَٰمُواْ عَلَى ٱلطَّرِيقَةِ لَأَسۡقَيۡنَٰهُم مَّآءً غَدَقٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wa-allawi is'taqāmū ʿalā al-ṭarīqati la-asqaynāhum māan ghadaqan
translations: surely We (would) have given them to drink
